Package org.junit.jupiter.migrationsupport.conditions

@NullMarked package org.junit.jupiter.migrationsupport.conditions
Deprecated extensions that provide support for conditional test execution features of JUnit 4 (e.g., the @Ignore annotation) within JUnit Jupiter.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.junit.jupiter.migrationsupport
    Deprecated support for migrating from JUnit 4 to JUnit Jupiter.
    org.junit.jupiter.migrationsupport.rules
    Deprecated extensions which provide (limited) support for JUnit 4 rules within JUnit Jupiter.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    IgnoreCondition
    Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
    Please use @Disabled instead.
